summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are directly related as they refer to the same chemical compound, 1,3-butadiene, which is a volatile organic compound associated with environmental tobacco smoke (ETS) exposure. The text discusses the significance of 1,3-butadiene as a contributor to cancer risk, highlighting its presence in ETS and its correlation with other harmful compounds. This indicates a clear and critical relationship between the two terms.
